title.rendered: Customized Android App Development Services in UK

content.rendered:
Android App Development Services

Android OS is fueling nearly seventy five percent of the whole Smartphones and mobile devices. With such a vast user based connected with Android OS, it is apparent to involve Android app development as a part of core tactics for top business, enterprises and startups. AppSquadz, a leading Android app development services UK, is known for rendering the best in class Android apps to clients all over the world.

Being a top Android Application Development Company in London, UK, we help worldwide businesses by developing and deploying top-notch android apps to keep them ahead of the curve. Not only we create great android apps, but also support in terms of marketing and monetization. Having ready to use framework and robust squad of android app developers in place, we speed up the process of app development and deploy the same as per the planned schedule.

We keep a clear picture in terms of wireframe, app design document, UIs design, programming, functional document, testing and deployment. At the commencement of project, our business analyst conducts a detailed meeting to conclude the draft. Our mobile UI designers work with client and design the layout, which is hundred percent in accordance to the need of the client. After the design gets approved, programming process is initiated and intermediate deliveries are put in terms of APK.

We understand the fact that Android is the fastest growing mobile OS platform, because of which the demand for Android app development services UK  is growing day by day. At AppSquadz, our aim is to craft high-tech android apps and endeavor wide android apps by uniting skills with utter enthusiasm. Our squad is having all the essential tools and excellent infrastructure to create, test and deploy apps. To develop Android based mobile apps, we employ Media APIs, Location-based Service APIs, Android SDK, Wi-Fi APIs, security architecture, OpenGL and 3D graphics.

We put forward custom-made software design and development services to any organization planning to make an enhancement in one or multiple aspects of their business. Customized software can help solve the issues which no off-the-shelf package can do. Plus, it is always in a position to bring the best possible solution as it is designed for a particular company and a specific requirement. At AppSquadz, we understand the responsibility of being the top Android App Development Services UK. We have designed and developed many custom applications for different clients, each of which has made a huge impact in the business process it was targeted at.
